channel.title: Packet not been installed after APP VM anon-whonix reboot
channel.description:
Hello,
I'v installed packet on the anon-whonix APP VM (terminator, ..) but after power off / turn on the APP VM it appeared that the packet have been uninstalled during the boot.
So I have to installed these packets on the TEMPLATE VM "sys-whonix", so it's been what I've done but after rebooting anon-whonix, there are still not present..
How can I forge packet installation on the anon-whonix APP VM ?
Thanks :)

item.description:
Hi michael

mickael:

So I have to installed these packets on the TEMPLATE VM “sys-whonix”, so it’s been what I’ve done but after rebooting anon-whonix, there are still not present…

In order for software to be persistent after reboot you have to install it in a template vm. If you want to use terminator in anon-whonix you must install in whonix-ws template.
